title: Drawing, "Tracings of Hebrew Manuscript Illuminations"
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite, lower right corner [sideways]:  SYNAGOGA/HISTORISCHES/MUSEUM. FRANKFURT/17 Mai - 16 Juli 1961/NER TAMID VERLAG/FRANKFURT/MAIN
creditline: Gift of Mr. Eric and Mrs. Sylvia Elsesser, The Trude Guermonprez Archives
description: Two tracings at upper left and right of sheet.  At left, a rectangle divided into five rectangles, one of which has large menorah; another has possibly ten commandments.  At upper right, images of tools or bones, pots, etc.) in six rectangles surrounded on four sides with Hebrew inscriptions.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Tracings of Hebrew Manuscript Illuminations".
Grahite on tracing paper. Gift of Mr. Eric and Mrs. Sylvia Elsesser, The Trude Guermonprez Archives. 1993-121-43.
